EmailTemplate.description: Includes link for PFQ. No RAIT, NIP. Mentions eLearning, 5 Reinforcement emails SG3. NO post program surveys
EmailTemplate.name: 01 Welcome Pack PFQ_eLearn - no post surveys
EmailTemplate.subject: Participant Information: ENSI Program for {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
As part of the ENS International {!Contact.Program_Name__c} Program for {!Contact.Job_Account_Name__c} you are attending on {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}, please read the following information to help empower your negotiation success.
Date: {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c}
Time: {!Contact.Job_Start_Finish_Time__c}
Venue: {!Contact.Job_Venue_Name__c} {!Contact.Job_Venue_Address__c} {!Contact.Job_City_State_PC__c} {!Contact.Job_Venue_Country__c}
Program Leader/s: {!Contact.Job_Presenters__c}
Dress: Smart casual
The ENS Program is not only about giving you the skills required to approach negotiations confidently but to also ensure that your learnings are sustained and become a force of habit. We believe that engaging you before and after the workshop will increase your learning outcomes and ask that you participate fully in the activities outlined below. Results of the post program case study and survey are returned to your management to assist them in understanding your challenges and successes.
Pre-Program Requirements
1.Program Focus Questionnaire 'PFQ'- the PFQ helps the program leader to customise the program based on your needs. We ask that all PFQs are completed by {!Contact.Job_PFQ_Due_Date__c}. Click here to access the questionnaire. http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/756776/PFQ-AND-RAIT-Survey?pfq-rait&rait=NO&jid={!Contact.Last_Job_ID__c}&pid={!Contact.Last_Participant_Id__c} Note: This link is specific to you, please don't forward to others. Please ensure Java is enabled in your web browser.
2.Please come briefed with notes on at least one current negotiation situation (for use in diagnosis and review sessions during the workshop).
Post Program Requirements
1.You will receive 6 reinforcement emails sent fortnightly for 12 weeks.
2.Within a week of the program finishing you will be sent login details to the ENS online reinforcement module which you’ll have 6 months unlimited access to.
3.Subscription to our eBulletin Negotium. If you don’t sign the subscription form at the program, please feel free to register online at www.negotiate.org
A full list of learning outcomes is available at {!Contact.Job_Learning_Outcome__c}.
We look forward to seeing you at the course!
Kind regards
{!Contact.Job_CSM_Name__c} Client Service Manager
Suite 507, 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia p: +61 9299 9688 f: +61 9299 1633 www.negotiate.org
Note this email and any attachments may be privileged and confidential. If you are not the intended recipient please delete the message and notify the sender. Copying or distribution by anyone else is prohibited. Thank you.
